experience.title: experience
experience.description:
PRISM GenAI Intern - Samsung R&D Institute


During my internship at Samsung R&D Institute India as a PRISM GenAI Intern, I specialized in creating and fine-tuning advanced AI models. This included web crawling e-commerce platforms using tools like Selenium and BeautifulSoup to build custom datasets, followed by prompt engineering to prepare training data. I fine-tuned the Llama3 Large Language Model (LLM) to answer domain-specific queries, leveraging techniques like instruction tuning and unslothing for performance optimization. This experience deepened my expertise in AI technologies and practical applications in e-commerce.

Intern Data Scientist - Abbott


As a Data Scientist Intern at Abbott, I conducted Payer Mix Analysis using SQL and advanced text processing on unstructured U.S. healthcare data. I worked on probabilistic record matching using the Splink package and clustering algorithms for linking Abbott’s databases. Additionally, I performed web scraping of healthcare websites and processed large datasets on Azure Databricks to uncover actionable insights. This role honed my skills in NLP, probabilistic modeling, and fuzzy matching while providing a solid understanding of the healthcare domain's business complexities.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description: I possess a strong technical foundation with expertise in Python, SQL, and frameworks like TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch. My proficiency extends to generative AI and data engineering tools, including Llama3, Kafka, Flask, and FastAPI. Additionally, I have hands-on experience with cloud platforms like Azure and GCP, and open-source technologies such as Vue.js, Docker, and PostgreSQL. My skillset spans areas like natural language processing, computer vision, and full-stack development, making me versatile across diverse technical domains.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description: I excel in critical thinking, effective communication, and teamwork, which have been integral to my success in collaborative projects and leadership roles. My organizational abilities ensure efficient time management, enabling me to balance academics, internships, and extracurricular commitments. These skills allow me to adapt to new challenges while fostering innovation and collaboration.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me:

I’m Adi Gulalkari, currently a student at IIT Madras and VIT Vellore, studying Data Science. I enjoy working in data science and other technology including Web Development and CyberSec. My work revolves around developing AI-driven innovations, uncovering insights from complex datasets, and building robust frameworks for data analysis.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: My interests lie in data science, data engineering, and exploring space and astrophysics. I am equally passionate about web development, leveraging modern frameworks and tools to build innovative, user-centric solutions. I enjoy merging these areas to work on interdisciplinary projects that solve real-world problems.

education.title: education
education.description:
VIT-BTech


Currently pursuing a BTech in Computer Science from VIT, Vellore, I have maintained an excellent academic record with a CGPA of 9.26. This program has provided me with a robust understanding of core computer science concepts, complemented by hands-on learning through internships and hackathons.

IITM-BSc


Simultaneously, I am pursuing a BS in Programming and Data Science from IIT Madras, where I have achieved a CGPA of 8.08. This interdisciplinary program has equipped me with skills in advanced data analysis, machine learning, and computational thinking, enhancing my expertise in solving data-driven challenges.

1.title: VC-Analyzer

2.title: ATM-Surveillance
2.description: A surveillance system is tailored to minimize the incidence of theft in ATMs. Its unique identification system aids in the swift identification of perpetrators in case of a robbery.

3.title: LegallyBot
3.description: A chat application that uses NLP techniques to answer questions about Legal stuff

4.title: Seek++
4.description: A replica of the NPTEL website with Generative AI, offering features like Weak Concepts generation, mock assignments generation, summaries generation, and programming assistance to support students' coursework.

5.title: ElderLink
5.description: A web application for elderly individuals addressing loneliness, health concerns, and boredom.
